title: Get The Witcher: Enhanced Edition for FREE!
description: Starting today, all GOG users can grab a free copy of The Witcher: Enhanced Edition Director's Cut! You just need to follow the instructions below!
instructions: 1. Download the GOG GALAXY App. 2. Go to the "Recent" view and check the banner at the top. 3. Then click the giveaway button. After a while, the game will show up in your library.
